name: Escape from Tartarus (Tomas Martinez, leex.8970, Cythonic)
name_original: Escape from Tartarus (Tomas Martinez, leex.8970, Cythonic)
description:
Traverse the realms of the underworld while collecting coins and dodging demons

  • Use WASD to move and your mouse to click through dialogue

"Escape from Tartarus" is a single player, top-down, action game inspired by games like asteroid avoider, space invaders, and Club Penguin's Hydro Hopper. 

Play as a ghost trapped in the depths of the underworld who enlists the help of Charon, ferryman of souls, for a fee. First escape from Tartarus, collecting coins along the way, until you have enough to bribe Charon into taking you to the next realm of the underworld until you reach the world above and start your new beginnings.
